question: Which company has posted a net loss of Rs 73,878 crore in this fiscal year, the highest ever reported by an Indian company?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s third largest telecom operator, Vodafone Idea reported the highest net loss in a fiscal year 2019-20.

This is the main reason of their huge net losses.  Out of the total dues estimated by the Department of Telecom, it has paid Rs 6,854.4 crore.
